timeline.bodyText: All new methods except for deleteAll aren't used anywhere (at least as far as I can see). Can we remove them from the PR?
timeline.author: nictas

timeline.bodyText: All new methods except for deleteAll aren't used anywhere (at least as far as I can see). Can we remove them from the PR?
timeline.author: nictas

replies.bodyText: Done, sorry for the dev leftovers
replies.author: boyan-velinov

timeline.bodyText: Can we avoid the complexity of having this object be built with Spring bean factories by keeping the @Named and @Inject annotations and add a @Primary annotation to the CredstoreConfigurationEntryMapper class from the internal project? @Profile annotations might also be an option if the first doesn't work.
timeline.author: nictas

timeline.bodyText: Why do we need this change?
timeline.author: nictas

replies.bodyText: Because we have to inherit it in the internal SAP project
replies.author: boyan-velinov

timeline.bodyText: This is not used anywhere. Can we remove it from the PR?
timeline.author: nictas
nictas

replies.bodyText: Done - the values should be null
replies.author: boyan-velinov
